title: Choosing Your Language
content:
The first step of the setup wizard lets you choose your preferred language for the application interface.

## Available Languages

**English**
- Standard left-to-right layout
- Default selection
- All features fully supported

**עברית (Hebrew)**
- Right-to-left (RTL) layout
- Mirror image interface
- Full translation of all text and menus

## How to Select

1. Click on your preferred language option
2. The interface immediately switches to that language
3. Click **Next** to continue setup

## Changing Language Later

You can change the language anytime after setup:
- Open **Settings** (gear icon or Ctrl+,)
- Go to **General** tab
- Select language from **Language Preferences**
- Click **Apply**

The interface will switch immediately - no restart required!

> **Tip:** If you select Hebrew, the entire interface will flip to right-to-left layout. Menus, dialogs, and panels will all mirror automatically.
